name: Bentley Holland & Partners Ltd
description: Established in 1990 and based in London Docklands, we are an independent design and branding agency, working in both public and private sectors. We always try to demonstrate a deep understanding of our clients’ needs and address them in a compelling and measurable way – it's about getting the most impact out of any budget.

locations.address: C21 Poplar Business Park 10 Prestons Road
